dependenciesComments.body-parser: This is a node.js middleware for handling JSON, Raw, Text and URL encoded form data
dependenciesComments.cookie-parser: Parse Cookie header and populate req.cookies with an object keyed by the cookie names
dependenciesComments.express: minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features to develop web and mobile applications
dependenciesComments.multer: This is a node.js middleware for handling multipart/form-data
